register.name: BPIALL
register.description: Invalidate all entries from branch predictors.

register.name: BPIALLIS
register.gui_name: Branch Predictor Invalidate All, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate all entries from branch predictors Inner Shareable.

register.name: BPIMVA
register.description: Invalidate virtual address from branch predictors.

register.name: DCCIMVAC
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Clean and Invalidate by VA to PoC
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data or unified cache line by virtual address to PoC.

register.name: DCCISW
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Clean and Invalidate by Set/Way
register.description: Clean and Invalidate data or unified cache line by set/way.

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level to operate on, minus 1. For example, this field is 0 for operations on L1 cache, or 1 for operations on L2 cache.

register.name: DCCMVAC
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Clean by VA to PoC
register.description: Clean data or unified cache line by virtual address to PoC.

register.name: DCCMVAU
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Clean by VA to PoU
register.description: Clean data or unified cache line by virtual address to PoU.

register.name: DCCSW
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Clean by Set/Way
register.description: Clean data or unified cache line by set/way.

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level to operate on, minus 1. For example, this field is 0 for operations on L1 cache, or 1 for operations on L2 cache.

register.name: DCIMVAC
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Invalidate by VA to PoC
register.description: Invalidate data or unified cache line by virtual address to PoC.

register.name: DCISW
register.gui_name: Data Cache line Invalidate by Set/Way
register.description: Invalidate data or unified cache line by set/way.

bitField.name: Level
bitField.description: Cache level to operate on, minus 1. For example, this field is 0 for operations on L1 cache, or 1 for operations on L2 cache.

register.name: ICIALLU
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Invalidate All to PoU
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches to PoU. If branch predictors are architecturally visible, also flush branch predictors.

register.name: ICIALLUIS
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Invalidate All to PoU, Inner Shareable
register.description: Invalidate all instruction caches Inner Shareable to PoU. If branch predictors are architecturally visible, also flush branch predictors.

register.name: ICIMVAU
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache line Invalidate by VA to PoU
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache line by virtual address to PoU.
